I remember the day when I found out about Half Life 2. It's one of the best games ever made. The graphics are cool, even tho that the game was made in 2004. 

It's fun to play, all chapters of the game are cool, and so are the episodes.

I hope more of the younger generation finds about Half Life 2's / Half Life's existence, and they will enjoy it as much as I do now.

С этой игрой я познакомился пару месяцев назад, а купил вчера. Знаете, что меня очень впечатляет? - Физика. Такой физики нету во многих современных играх. Ну и графон для 2004 года был нереально красивым. Рекомендую!
经典之作·，拿到2021年仍然不过时。fps的开山之作，同时有着单机游戏剧情以及玩法的多样性。

I love the first Half-Life. Black Mesa is a faithful recreation. When it comes to sequels, I find that it's kind of a LITTLE rare to come across a sequel that outdoes the first game or even captures the original's feel in the first place. Half-Life 2, I can proudly say, is one of these "rare" findings. I enjoyed this game slightly more than it's predecessor. While I can't say I know TOO much about it's story, from what I understood in the game, the story was great. I won't say too much about it as I do not want to spoil much but I particularly admired the character development. The Character development was what had caused me to even understand the game's story a little more in the first place. This game also notably felt a little more intuitive compared to the first half-life, but not necessarily easier, which was definitely a plus because there were a few times in the first half-life where I admittedly got stuck. But while doing all of this, it maintains the linear puzzle-combat gameplay that we all loved in the first. This is TRULY a game that every fan of the FPS genre should experience.

This game is old and it was cheap so I thought... Meh, see what the deal is and ..... wow! good game and no regrets. I played through the full game and will be leaping into another HL game. 100% recommend for any gamer (new/seasoned).

Ah, Half Life 2 one of my favorite games of all time. The story is great, the sound design is great, the shooting is underwhelming but but most of all it has a great community! The art, Gmod, the memes, where all made by the community,
If Half Life 2 never existed gaming as we know it wouldn't either.

Absolutely one of the best shooter games of all time. It may not have the most advanced mechanics, but it sure does top every other game in terms of story, play-ability, and many other game factors. 100/10, would recommend.
